duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in executing rate strategies through deep analysis, research, and rate filings.
Develop end-to-end product review process including competitor research, building GLMs, loss experience review, and rate filings.
Support the quarterly rate indication process by preparing exhibits, validating assumptions, and presenting results to underwriting management.
Develop data processes including understanding data structures, creating SQL queries, building validation processes, and addressing data inconsistencies.

education_certification.credential: Education equivalent to a college degree in Actuarial Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, or related field, or the equivalent in related work experience.
